content:
PartitionRestartProgress Class

Definition

Returns Invoke quorum loss progress object.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract]
public sealed class PartitionRestartProgress : System.Fabric.TestCommandProgress
Inheritance
Object
TestCommandProgress
PartitionRestartProgress
Attributes
System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract

Inherited Members

State

Remarks

This class returns the TestCommandProgressState, Result (when in Completed or Faulted state), and Exception (when in Faulted state) information for the invoke quorum loss action.

Properties

Result

Gets the result of the restart partition action; this is avaliable only when the action is in Completed or Faulted state.

Methods

ToString()

Returns a string representation of the contained information
